name: Jan Lammers
introduction: Johannes "Jan" Lammers (born 2 June 1956 in Zandvoort, Zandvoort Municipality, North Holland, Netherlands) is a Dutch former racing driver and team principal who raced in Formula One in two separate spells, from 1979 to 1982 and in 1992.  Lammers never got a drive a front-running car and racked up a large number of non-qualifications.
